data.actual_result: A grey line left by the new typing status indicator is shown above the textbox. Rotating the screen somehow fixes the issue
data.short_description: After the typing status has appeared once during the session in any channel, a grey line is left above the textbox when nobody is typing
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to 7.4.5 - Make sure you are in an inactive chat when you start the app. Notice everything's normal above the textbox - Now switch to an active channel with lots of people typing. Notice the new shiny typing indicator design - Now switch back to the inactive channel. Notice the grey line above the textbox
